organization.$: Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics

head.citation-title: Accuracy analysis on bundle adjustment of remote sensing images based on dual quaternion
head.abstracts: Â© 2015, Nanjing University of Aeronautics an Astronautics. All right reserved.A bundle adjustment method of remote sensing images based on dual quaternion is presented, which conducted the uniform disposal corresponding location and attitude of sequence images by the dual quaternion. The constraint relationship of image itself and sequence images is constructed to compensate the systematic errors. The feasibility of this method used in bundle adjustment is theoretically tested by the analysis of the structural characteristics of error equation and normal equation based on dual quaternion. Different distributions of control points and stepwise regression analysis are introduced into the experiment for RC30 image. The results show that the adjustment accuracy can achieve 0.2 m in plane and 1 m in elevation. As a result, this method provides a new technique for geometric location problem of remote sensing images.
